row.process: :SET &seconds = DIV(&UC4RB_NW_PING_TIMEOUT#, 1000) uname=`uname -s` if [ $uname = SunOS ]; then ping &UC4RB_NW_PING_HOST# &seconds else ping -c 1 -w &seconds &UC4RB_NW_PING_HOST# fi :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_SHELL_CMD@UNIX

row.post_process:
:SET &checkForText# = "rtt *" !rtt min/avg/max/mdev = 0.058/0.058/0.058/0.000 ms :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.RETRIEVE_LINE_BY_TEXT :IF STR_LENGTH(&UC4RB_RESULT_LINE#) > 10 : PSET &rtt# = SUBSTR(&UC4RB_RESULT_LINE#,23) : SET &rtt# = STR_TRIM(&rtt#) : SET &idx# = STR_FIND(&rtt#, "/") : SET &idx# = SUB(&idx#, 1) : SET &rtt# = SUBSTR(&rtt#, 1, &idx#)
: SET &UC4RB_NW_PING_OUT_RTD# = "&rtt#" : PUBLISH &UC4RB_NW_PING_OUT_RTD#, , "WORKFLOW" : SET &UC4RB_NW_PING_OUT_ALIVE# = "1" : PUBLISH &UC4RB_NW_PING_OUT_ALIVE#, , "WORKFLOW" :ELSE : SET &UC4RB_NW_PING_OUT_RTD# = "-1" : PUBLISH &UC4RB_NW_PING_OUT_RTD#, , "WORKFLOW" : SET &UC4RB_NW_PING_OUT_ALIVE# = "0" : PUBLISH &UC4RB_NW_PING_OUT_ALIVE#, , "WORKFLOW" :ENDIF
